verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments, set to the Sheminith. A Psalm of David. O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, rebuke <S%H3198><s%> me not in thine anger <S%H639><s%>, Neither chasten <S%H3256><s%> me in thy hot displeasure <S%H2534><s%>.
Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; for I am withered <S%H536><s%> away <S%H3068><s%>: O Jehovah, heal <S%H7495><s%> me <S%H6106><s%>; for my bones are troubled <S%H926><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> also is sore <S%H3966><s%> troubled <S%H926><s%>: And thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, how long?
Return <S%H7725><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, deliver <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: Save <S%H3467><s%> me for thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>' sake.
For in death <S%H4194><s%> there is no remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of thee <S%H7585><s%>: In Sheol who shall give thee thanks <S%H3034><s%>?

I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my groaning <S%H585><s%>; Every night <S%H3915><s%> make I my bed <S%H4296><s%> to swim <S%H7811><s%>; I water <S%H4529><s%> my couch <S%H4296><s%> with my tears <S%H1832><s%>.
Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> wasteth <S%H6244><s%> away because of grief <S%H3708><s%>; It waxeth old <S%H6275><s%> because of all mine adversaries <S%H6887><s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from me <S%H6466><s%>, all ye workers of iniquity <S%H205><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my weeping <S%H1065><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will receive <S%H3947><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>.

All mine enemies <S%H341><s%> shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%> and sore <S%H3966><s%> troubled <S%H926><s%>: They shall turn back <S%H7725><s%>, they shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%> suddenly <S%H7281><s%>.
